title: Losing honor rank with transfer
body:
Hey can we discuss this?
Does the honor level reset completely to 0?
I mean, I understand you are moving to a different community, but losing the honor rank completely doesn't seem fair to me.
Like for the League Rank,

> You will be seeded into a Ranked League after you play 1 Ranked game on your new server. The seeding will be based on your current MMR in relation to the MMR of everyone on that server, so you could end up in a different Tier or Division compared to the League you were in on your original server.

Honor Rank should be reassigned based on the amount of honor you received compared to the local community.
Riot FAQs don't say much about it.
Losing honor completely and starting from 0 when you are almost level 4, with the way it's designed now, means that summoners transfering won't make it to the top even if they had a good behaviour throughout the season, just cause they had to restart from scratch.

Does anybody know what happens exactly? Do you get reset to 0 or maybe just 1 level behind like for the start of the season?

***EDIT:
i just thought of something else. i recently got a pbe account so i can play from euw with my oce friends with less lag.
one of the requirements to have it is to be at least lvl 3 honor. once i transfer and my honor gets reset to 2, will i still be able to access pbe? if not that would be unfair as well...

replies.body: To clarify, you haven't transferred you are just speculating what happens to your honour when you do? I would expect it simply doesn't change, but I'll see if I can find out.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=Qz8qunRy,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-05-29T09:39:03.137+0000)
>
> I would expect it simply doesn't change, but I'll see if I can find out.

Transfers FAQ page don't say anything but listing it under the "Things that won't transfer"
Hmm in that case it likely resets to Honour 2 since that's the base. Honour 0 is only achievable if you are punished. You could think of Honour 2 as the ground floor, and Honour 0 as the basement.

still kinda disappointing, with the new system it takes so long to reach checkpoints and level up.
not sure if playing mostly aram with friends makes it worse (i know honor from friends is worth less, not sure if it's worth even less on aram)

My best guess is it pretty much comes down to the same principles for rank not transferring. Ranks between regions differ wildly, and so do cultures and attitudes. There are more than a few things that will see you punished on NA but have little or no consequence on OCE. Simply put, the culture, attitudes, and things we deem honourable (or dishonourable) vary significantly between region, same as the rank distribution does.

While I don't see any particular harm in transferring honour level (though I wouldn't be surprised if there is also a technical element to it not transferring) I also understand why it's a thing. Honour is ultimately a community driven affair, so Honour that applies to one community may only apply in part or not at all to another. A full reset does seem a little harsh I'll admit, but there might also be more to it that we're missing.
that was my point exactly... i understand you are moving to a different community, but resetting it completely seems too much, should be "rebalanced" to the new environment like the league rank

I haven't transferred yet just cause transfers were disabled the day before I moved, I have been waiting to do it, I even sent a ticket but I have to wait the 2nd of June (hopefully they'll restore them on time, knowing the whole team is busy fixing Clash...)
